mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_DIARY(MEMBER_ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{memberId}, NOW(), #{memberId}, NOW())
INSERT INTO TB_DIARY_HISTORY(DIARY_ID, MEMBER_ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT) VALUES (#{diaryId}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{memberId}, NOW(), #{memberId}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_DIARY SET MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPD_ID = #{memberId}, UPD_DT = NOW() WHERE DIARY_ID = #{diaryId}
